rule: If the chatbot is unable to process or determine the part of speech for the provided word, the output must not be "CantAnswer"; it must instead provide an explanation or reasoning in multi-line text.
input: sentence: Excessive token #problems handled., word: TokenNotExist
output:
I will tag the given words according to their part of speech.

Sensor exists in the sentence. (PPS) 

The word 'TokenNotExist' does not match any word in the given sentence and cannot be tagged as it is an invalid word.
complianceText:
The chatbot provides explanations before the tag and handles the case where the word doesn't exist, which is not mentioned in the description. Also, it returns 'PPS' which is not one of the tags specified in the description.
ERR
